name: Chao Perpetuum
description:
Spread the corruption of Chaos and establish world dominance in this action-strategy hybrid all about creating hordes of mutants. As an Agent of Chaos your goal is to destroy all of the opposing Agents of Cosmos. Drain their life, change the environment into your servants and ruin perfection.

Made as part of the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Controls:

WASD - movement

Select abilities:
Q - Mutation of object
E - Life Drain

LMB - Mutating highlighted objects

RMB - Life Drain (point at the enemy and hold)

MMB - hold to rotate camera
